description: Treat yourself to dinner in this elegant restaurant right on the lakefront, dining in summer in the beautiful garden within a stone’s throw of the lake. The menu features imaginative Mediterranean specialities (meat as well as fresh- and saltwater fish) on two tasting menus and an extensive à la carte.
